name: Bouncy Blocks (GMTK Game Jam 2018)
description:
The not so critically acclaimed sequel to  Project Blocks, but with way less platforming, getting burned by fire and more...bouncing.

It's now a platformer, but you can't stop jumping.

Notes:

- WASD or Arrow Keys to move around.

- Use the mouse to bounce Blocky off it! 

- If you're stuck, F5 for a quick restart.

Credits:

- Nickbot, for creating these art assets from the previous Game Jam.

- The good folks who made BFXR, for providing the sound effects.
